bug.author: csukuangfj
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => master
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
Refer to the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/master/modules/viz/include/opencv2/viz/types.hpp#L307>code</denchmark-link>
inline cv::viz::Color cv::viz::Color::brown() { return Color(0, 75, 150); } The RGB color code for brown should be (165, 42, 42) instead of (150, 75, 0).

comments.comment: Hello, I am new to open source community. Can I work on this issue?
Hi, This issue is already fixed: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/pull/10782>#10782</denchmark-link>
